name: Future Front(Idle Game)
description:
[No internal purchase, 0 payment! Subversive innovation! 0 payment for a thousand people in the same service!]


Still playing the kryptonite ten consecutive draw card game?
Don't play the kryptonite ten consecutive draw card game!
Come and try our subversive and innovative [buyout strategy card game with a thousand players]!

We have replicated all the card game systems you can see on the market!
Whether it's, hero upgrade, level up, star promotion, equipment strengthening, equipment word
Whether it's hero upgrades, upgrades, star upgrades, equipment enhancements, equipment entries, collectibles, exploration, challenge towers, world bosses, hundreds of skills, dozens of girl heroes.
Even thousands of people in the same service, guild play, guild war, the whole service ranking, fair competition, and so on.
All the gameplay you can see in the money-charging ten consecutive draw handicraft, we all subversive innovation and reproduction!
And [no internal purchase! Totally 0 payment!

Some of you ask, what about the ten in a row card draw?
Come and try our subversive innovation of placing can open the treasure chest! You can get new heroes by placing them! No insider purchases! No in-purchase!
You can even use the placement of the full star full rank hero deck full collection! You can even play online with thousands of people! No insider purchases! Completely 0 payment!

"If there is an awakening way to make the kryptonite ten consecutive draw handicraft no more money, then we are the first to stand out and hit the stone with an egg!"
